artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Wakasaya Yoichi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 241, ōtanzaku #6.9
inscription: 十八公栄霜後露　一千年色雪中深 {jūhachi kō sakae shimo nochini tsuyu to naru / issennen no iro setchū ni fukashi} (When pine leaves turn into green, frost on them finally change into dew. One thousand-year lasting color had to be under snow deeply.(I guess!))
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of pictures of flowers and birds with poems in ōtanzaku
title: Macaw on Pine Branch
